name: Realms of Arkania: Shadows over Riva
name_original: Realms of Arkania: Shadows over Riva
description:
Realms of Arkania: Shadows over Riva is a RPG game developed by Attic Entertainment Software and Fantasy Productions. It came out on 01-01-1997. Sir-Tech Software published the game. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
Realms of Arkania: Shadows over Riva is available on PC.
It was scored by Guido Henkel.
